title: Stellr - where astrophiles orbit
description: A mobile application where space enthusiasts can view space-related news, publish and join space-related community events such as stargazing

title: Totally Geek
description: An e-commerce website for comic books, graphic novels, and action figures built with Wordpress and WooCommerce. Designed and developed in compliance for an academic requirement.

title: iEnroll
description: An enrollment management system for high school and elementary schools developed in compliance for an academic requirement. Served as the project's lead front-end developer.

title: Reverie
description: A mobile application to record your dreams. Integrated with a search functionality that searches the internet for the meaning of your dreams.

title: Consumption Dashboard
description: A website that displays consumption predictions in an interactive dashboard with colorful graphs and charts. Utilized machine learning model for the prediction.
